root.name: FIFA Soccer 07
root.description: GameplayEngland Premiership Considered by many to be the last FIFA game to be truly "arcade". Undoubtedly, however, this was the FIFA to play the fastest, control the easiest and feature the heaviest use of the skill stick, while it's successor slowed the game down by reportedly 40% and put a heavier emphasis on passing. This was also the first, and last FIFA to make managerial mode tiered, requiring the player to manage lowly clubs, building a reputation, and slowly moving up to the cream of the crop, so to speak. Game Modes Manager Mode- Manager Mode allows you to take on the role of manager and lead your club to victory in the league. This is the main single player mode of the game though it can also be played with multiple people. List of teams on PS2, Xbox and PC:English PremiershipArsenalAston VillaBlackburnBoltonCharltonChelseaEvertonFulhamLiverpoolMan CityMan UnitedMiddlesboroughNewcastlePortsmouthReading CitySheffield
